intro: Pleurolobus spicatus, commonly known as the spiny pleurolobus, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its spiny stems and palmate leaves. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically pink or purple in color.
